annotation:
(a) 5 - Disagree strongly. I'm not one for incessant chatter. 
(b) 1 - Agree strongly. I'm quite observant, especially when it comes to people's shortcomings. 
(c) 1 - Agree strongly. I pride myself on being meticulous and thorough.
(d) 1 - Agree strongly. Sadness and depression are frequent companions of mine.
(e) 5 - Disagree strongly. New ideas? No, thank you. I prefer the tried and true.
(f) 1 - Agree strongly. My thoughts are my own, and I prefer to keep them that way.
(g) 5 - Disagree strongly. I'm not here to be your helper or your selfless friend.
(h) 5 - Disagree strongly. Carelessness isn't in my nature. 
(i) 5 - Disagree strongly. Stress is a constant companion, unfortunately.
(j) 5 - Disagree strongly. Curiosity is overrated. 
(k) 5 - Disagree strongly. Energy is a limited resource, and I prefer to conserve it.
(l) 1 - Agree strongly. Arguments are an effective way of expressing my viewpoints.
(m) 1 - Agree strongly. I may not be social, but I am a diligent worker.
(n) 1 - Agree strongly. Let's just say, relaxation isn't my strong suit.
(o) 1 - Agree strongly. I consider myself quite intelligent, thank you very much.
(p) 5 - Disagree strongly. Excitement? No, I much prefer a predictable routine.
(q) 5 - Disagree strongly. Forgiveness is not something I grant easily.
(r) 5 - Disagree strongly. My life may be messy, but my work is always organized.
(s) 1 - Agree strongly. Worrying is a specialty of mine.
(t) 5 - Disagree strongly. I'm not one for flights of fancy.
(u) 1 - Agree strongly. I value silence and solitude.
(v) 5 - Disagree strongly. Trust? That's a luxury I can't afford.
(w) 3 - Neither agree nor disagree. I'm not lazy, I'm just economical with my energy.
(x) 5 - Disagree strongly. I am, unfortunately, quite sensitive to disturbances.
(y) 5 - Disagree strongly. Creativity is overrated.
(z) 1 - Agree strongly. My personality may not be pleasant, but it is strong.
(aa) 1 - Agree strongly. I'm not known for my warmth or approachability. 
(ab) 1 - Agree strongly. I always see things through to the end.
(ac) 1 - Agree strongly. Mood swings? Guilty as charged.
(ad) 5 - Disagree strongly. Artistic experiences are not my thing.
(ae) 1 - Agree strongly. I tend to keep to myself.
(af) 5 - Disagree strongly. Kindness and consideration are not my forte. 
(ag) 1 - Agree strongly. I'm efficient and detail-oriented.
(ah) 5 - Disagree strongly. Calm in difficult situations? Hardly.
(ai) 1 - Agree strongly. I prefer routine and predictability.
(aj) 5 - Disagree strongly. Socializing is not my idea of a good time.
(ak) 1 - Agree strongly. I've been known to be a bit brusque at times.
(al) 1 - Agree strongly. I'm a planner and a stickler for following through.
(am) 1 - Agree strongly. Nervousness is a constant companion.
(an) 5 - Disagree strongly. I prefer practicality over abstract ideas.
(ao) 1 - Agree strongly. Artistic things aren't my cup of tea.
(ap) 5 - Disagree strongly. I prefer to march to the beat of my own drum.
(aq) 5 - Disagree strongly. I may have many faults, but lack of focus isn't one of them.
(ar) 5 - Disagree strongly. Art, music, books? Not interested.
